                                                                                                                                      October 2020
                                                                                                                                      
         
         
                                                                                                                                      Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                      On Reducing the Energy Consumption of Software: From Hurdles to Requirements
                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                      • Zakaria Ournani, 
                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                      • Romain Rouvoy, 
                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                      • Pierre Rust, 
                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                      • Joel Penhoat
                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                      ESEM '20: Proceedings of the 14th ACM / IEEE International Symposium on Empirical Software Engineering
                     and Measurement (ESEM)October 2020, Article No.: 14, pp 1–12https://doi.org/10.1145/3382494.3410678
                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                      Background. As software took control over hardware in many domains, the question of
                  the energy footprint induced by the software is becoming critical for our society,
                  as the resources powering the underlying infrastructure are finite. Yet, beyond this
                  ...

                                                                                                                                        Voltage island-driven power optimization for application specific network-on-chip
                     design
                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                        • Kan Wang, 
                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                        • Sheqin Dong, 
                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                        • Satoshi Goto
                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                        GLSVLSI '12: Proceedings of the great lakes symposium on VLSIMay 2012, pp 171–176https://doi.org/10.1145/2206781.2206823
                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                        In this paper, a voltage island aware framework is proposed for low power design of
                  application specific NoC (LPASNoC). Through a three-phase processing including voltage
                  island generation, VI-driven floorplanning and post-floorplan processing, the ...

                                                                                                                                          Software assisted non-volatile register reduction for energy harvesting based cyber-physical
                     system
                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                          • Mengying Zhao, 
                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                          • Qingan Li, 
                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                          • Mimi Xie, 
                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                          • Yongpan Liu, 
                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                          • Jingtong Hu, 
                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                          • Chun Jason Xue
                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                          DATE '15: Proceedings of the 2015 Design, Automation & Test in Europe Conference & ExhibitionMarch 2015, pp 567–572
                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                          Wearable devices are important components as information collector in many cyber-physical
                  systems. Energy harvesting instead of battery is a better power source for these wearable
                  devices due to many advantages. However, harvested energy is naturally ...
                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                            • 11
                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                            • 286
                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                            Metrics
                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                            Total Citations11
                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                            Total Downloads286

                                                                                                                                            Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                            Investigating the impacts of web servers on web application energy usage
                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                            • Irene Manotas, 
                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                            • Cagri Sahin, 
                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                            • James Clause, 
                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                            • Lori Pollock, 
                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                            • Kristina Winbladh
                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                            GREENS '13: Proceedings of the 2nd International Workshop on Green and Sustainable SoftwareMay 2013, pp 16–23
                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                            Software engineers make decisions about the design of the software they are creating
                  on a daily basis. These decisions may impact the application in terms of efficiency,
                  usability, flexibility, etc. Different competing design decisions are therefore ...

                                                                                                                                              Dynamic adaptive virtual core mapping to improve power, energy, and performance in
                     multi-socket multicores
                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                              • Chang S. Bae, 
                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                              • Lei Xia, 
                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                              • Peter Dinda, 
                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                              • John Lange
                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                              HPDC '12: Proceedings of the 21st international symposium on High-Performance Parallel and Distributed
                     ComputingJune 2012, pp 247–258https://doi.org/10.1145/2287076.2287114
                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                              Consider a multithreaded parallel application running inside a multicore virtual machine
                  context that is itself hosted on a multi-socket multicore physical machine. How should
                  the VMM map virtual cores to physical cores? We compare a local mapping, ...
                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                • 6
                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                • 308
                                                                                                                                                  •

                                                                                                                                                Unleashing the hidden power of compiler optimization on binary code difference: an
                     empirical study
                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                • Xiaolei Ren, 
                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                • Michael Ho, 
                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                • Jiang Ming, 
                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                • Yu Lei, 
                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                • Li Li
                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                PLDI 2021: Proceedings of the 42nd ACM SIGPLAN International Conference on Programming Language
                     Design and ImplementationJune 2021, pp 142–157https://doi.org/10.1145/3453483.3454035
                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                Hunting binary code difference without source code (i.e., binary diffing) has compelling
                  applications in software security. Due to the high variability of binary code, existing
                  solutions have been driven towards measuring semantic similarities from ...

                                                                                                                                                  Optimizing Cryptography in Energy Harvesting Applications
                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                  • Charles Suslowicz, 
                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                  • Archanaa S. Krishnan, 
                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                  • Patrick Schaumont
                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                  ASHES '17: Proceedings of the 2017 Workshop on Attacks and Solutions in Hardware SecurityNovember 2017, pp 17–26https://doi.org/10.1145/3139324.3139329
                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                  The Internet of Things will need to support ubiquitous and continuous connectivity
                  to resource constrained and energy constrained devices. To this end, we consider the
                  optimization of cryptographic protocols under energy harvesting conditions. ...
                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                    • 3
                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                    • 177
                                                                                                                                                      •

                                                                                                                                                    research-article
                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                    January 2009
                                                                                                                                                    
         
         
                                                                                                                                                    Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                    Gating transistor power saving technique for power optimized code book SRAM
                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                    • Madan Mali, 
                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                    • Mukul Sutaone, 
                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                    • Shital Tak
                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                    ICAC3 '09: Proceedings of the International Conference on Advances in Computing, Communication
                     and ControlJanuary 2009, pp 581–584https://doi.org/10.1145/1523103.1523220
                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                    Low power feature associated with Static Random Access Memory (SRAM) is evaluated.
                  By using gating transistor power saving technique (GTSPT), the average power of SRAM
                  can be reduced. Using GTSPT scheme the average precharge current and the supply ...
                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                      • 0
                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                      • 72
                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                      Metrics
                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                      Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                      Total Downloads72
                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                      Last 12 Months4
                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                      Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                      •

      
                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                    • Export Citations
                                                                                                                                                      • 
                        
                                                                                                                                                    • Save to Binder

                                                                                                                                                      research-article
                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                      November 2014
                                                                                                                                                      
         
         
                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                      On improving green mining for energy-aware software analysis
                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                      • Stephen Romansky, 
                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                      • Abram Hindle
                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                      CASCON '14: Proceedings of 24th Annual International Conference on Computer Science and Software
                     EngineeringNovember 2014, pp 234–245
                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                      Consumer demand for longer lasting battery life in mobile computers, as well as industry
                  interest in energy efficient cloud infrastructure, creates a need for hardware and
                  software energy efficiency improvements. One way to tackle this problem is from a
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                        • 0
                                                                                                                                                          •

                                                                                                                                                        Automating energy optimization with features
                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                        • Norbert Siegmund, 
                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                        • Marko Rosenmüller, 
                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                        • Sven Apel
                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                        FOSD '10: Proceedings of the 2nd International Workshop on Feature-Oriented Software DevelopmentOctober 2010, pp 2–9https://doi.org/10.1145/1868688.1868690
                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                        Mobile devices such as cell phones and notebooks rely on battery power supply. For
                  these systems, optimizing the power consumption is important to increase the system's
                  lifetime. However, this is hard to achieve because energy-saving functions often ...

                                                                                                                                                          April 2017
                                                                                                                                                          
         
         
                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                          Evaluating effects of application based and automatic energy saving strategies on
                     NWChem
                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                          • Vaibhav Sundriyal, 
                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                          • Ellie Fought, 
                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                          • Masha Sosonkina, 
                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                          • Theresa L. Windus
                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                          HPC '17: Proceedings of the 25th High Performance Computing SymposiumApril 2017, Article No.: 16, pp 1–12
                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                          High-performance application developers are becoming increasingly aware of effects
                  of the increasing energy consumption on the costs and reliability of modern computing
                  systems. A traditional way to achieve energy savings is by changing the processor
                  ...

                                                                                                                                                            research-article
                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                            October 2012
                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                            Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                            Software energy optimization through fine-grained function-level voltage and frequency
                     scaling
                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                            • Carlo Brandolese, 
                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                            • William Fornaciari
                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                            CODES+ISSS '12: Proceedings of the eighth IEEE/ACM/IFIP international conference on Hardware/software
                     codesign and system synthesisOctober 2012, pp 539–546https://doi.org/10.1145/2380445.2380528
                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                            This paper presents a methodology and a toolchain to perform estimation and optimization
                  of the energy consumption associated to software execution on tiny embedded systems.
                  The estimation phase is based on an ISA-level characterization of the target ...
                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                              • 2
                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                              • 82
                                                                                                                                                                •
