                                                                                                                                                                                  February 2016
                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                  Public Access
                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                  Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  NRG-loops: adjusting power from within applications
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                  • Melanie Kambadur, 
                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                  • Martha A. Kim
                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  CGO '16: Proceedings of the 2016 International Symposium on Code Generation and OptimizationFebruary 2016, pp 206–215https://doi.org/10.1145/2854038.2854045
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                   NRG-Loops are source-level abstractions that allow an application to dynamically
                  manage its power and energy through adjustments to functionality, performance, and
                  accuracy. The adjustments, which come in the form of truncated, adapted, or perforated
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    • 8
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    • 304
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                    Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Citations8
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Downloads304
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 12 Months34
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 6 weeks1
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                  •

                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                  • Export Citations
                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                  • Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                    Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                      •

                                                                                                                                                                                    research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                    September 2013
                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                    On the automatic generation of GPU-oriented software applications from RTL IPs
                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                    • Nicola Bombieri, 
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                    • Franco Fummi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                    • Sara Vinco
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                    CODES+ISSS '13: Proceedings of the Ninth IEEE/ACM/IFIP International Conference on Hardware/Software
                     Codesign and System SynthesisSeptember 2013, Article No.: 12, pp 1–10
                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                    Graphics processing units (GPUs) have been explored as a new computing paradigm for
                  accelerating computation intensive applications. In particular, the combination between
                  GPUs and CPU has proved to be an effective solution for accelerating the software
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                      • 41
                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                      Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Citations1
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Downloads41
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 12 Months1
                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                      Research on Evaluation Method of Integrated Energy Service Level of Power Generation
                     Enterprises
                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                      • Yi Li, 
                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                      • Baozhong Zhou
                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                      IEEA 2021: 2021 The 10th International Conference on Informatics, Environment, Energy and ApplicationsMarch 2021, pp 57–62https://doi.org/10.1145/3458359.3458372
                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                      China is in a critical period of energy transformation. With the in-depth adjustment
                  of Internet information technology, renewable energy technology and power system reform,
                  the development of comprehensive energy services is the main direction of the ...

                                                                                                                                                                                        research-article

                                                                                                                                                                                        Energy efficiency in robotics software: a systematic literature review
                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                        • Stan Swanborn, 
                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                        • Ivano Malavolta
                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                        ASE '20: Proceedings of the 35th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Automated Software Engineering
                     WorkshopsSeptember 2020, pp 144–151https://doi.org/10.1145/3417113.3422997
                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                        Nowadays, robots are widely used in many areas of our lifes, such as autonomous storage,
                  self-driving vehicles, drones, industrial automation, etc. Energy is a critical factor
                  for robotic systems, especially for mobile robots where energy is a finite ...
                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                          • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                          • 38
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                          Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Downloads38
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 12 Months38
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 6 weeks7
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                          /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F3417113.3422997&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights

                                       Create a New Binder

                                                                                                                                                                                          research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                          September 2013
                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          An energy-efficient 5-MHz to 20-MHz, 12-bit reconfigurable continuous-time ΣΔ modulator
                     for 4G-LTE application
                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          • Jing Li, 
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ruiyuan Zhu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ting Yi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          • Bill Liu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          • Zhiliang Hong
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          ISLPED '13: Proceedings of the 2013 International Symposium on Low Power Electronics and DesignSeptember 2013, pp 163–168
                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          This paper presents an energy-efficient reconfigurable 3rd-order continuous-time ΣΔ modulator, which can satisfy multi-band modes for 4G-LTE
                  application. To expand the reconfigurable bandwidth range and optimize the energy
                  efficiency, this work employs ...
                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 34
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                            Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Downloads34
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 12 Months3
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 6 weeks0
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                          •

                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                                            research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                            September 2012
                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                            Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            Power-aware multi-core simulation for early design stage hardware/software co-optimization
                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            • Wim Heirman, 
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            • Souradip Sarkar, 
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            • Trevor E. Carlson, 
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            • Ibrahim Hur, 
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            • Lieven Eeckhout
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            PACT '12: Proceedings of the 21st international conference on Parallel architectures and compilation
                     techniquesSeptember 2012, pp 3–12https://doi.org/10.1145/2370816.2370820
                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            Stringent performance targets and power constraints push designers towards building
                  specialized workload-optimized systems across a broad spectrum of the computing arena,
                  including supercomputing applications as exemplified by the IBM BlueGene and Intel
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              • 465
                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                              Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Citations20
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Downloads465
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 12 Months8
                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 6 weeks1
