                                                                                                                                                                                                                Enhancing workload-dependent voltage scaling for energy-efficient ultra-low-power
                     embedded systems
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Veni Mohan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Akhilesh Iyer, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • John Sartori
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                DAC '18: Proceedings of the 55th Annual Design Automation ConferenceJune 2018, Article No.: 42, pp 1–6https://doi.org/10.1145/3195970.3196046
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                Ultra-low-power (ULP) chipsets are in higher demand than ever due to the proliferation
                  of ULP embedded systems to support growing applications like the Internet of Things
                  (IoT), wearables and sensor networks. Since ULP systems are also cost constrained,
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 136
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Downloads136
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 12 Months14
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 6 weeks1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Code generation for an application-specific VLIW processor with clustered, addressable
                     register files
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Ivan Llopard, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Albert Cohen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Christian Fabre, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Jérôme Martin, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Henri-Pierre Charles, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Christian Bernard
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ODES '13: Proceedings of the 10th Workshop on Optimizations for DSP and Embedded SystemsFebruary 2013, pp 11–19https://doi.org/10.1145/2443608.2443612
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Modern compilers integrate recent advances in compiler construction, intermediate
                  representations, algorithms and programming language front-ends. Yet code generation
                  for application-specific architectures benefits only marginally from this trend, as
                  ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                    research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    August 2020
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Exploiting Dynamism in HPC Applications to Optimize Energy-Efficiency
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Madhura Kumaraswamy, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Michael Gerndt
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ICPP Workshops '20: 49th International Conference on Parallel Processing - ICPP : WorkshopsAugust 2020, Article No.: 9, pp 1–10https://doi.org/10.1145/3409390.3409399
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     The growing need for computational performance is resulting in an increase in the
                  energy consumption of HPC systems, which is a major challenge to reach Exascale computing.
                  To overcome this challenge, we developed a tuning plugin that targets ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 48
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Downloads48
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 12 Months48
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 6 weeks7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                       Create a New Binder

                                                                                                                                                                                                                      research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      March 2020
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Energy-efficient runtime resource management for adaptable multi-application mapping
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Robert Khasanov, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Jeronimo Castrillon
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      DATE '20: Proceedings of the 23rd Conference on Design, Automation and Test in EuropeMarch 2020, pp 909–914
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Modern embedded computing platforms consist of a high amount of heterogeneous resources,
                  which allows executing multiple applications on a single device. The number of running
                  application on the system varies with time and so does the amount of ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 15
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Metrics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 12 Months12
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 6 weeks0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 



                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        December 2011
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Self-management of applications QoS for energy optimization in datacenters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Frederico Alvares de Oliveira, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Thomas Ledoux
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        GCM '11: Green Computing Middleware on Proceedings of the 2nd International WorkshopDecember 2011, Article No.: 3, pp 1–6https://doi.org/10.1145/2088996.2088999
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        As a direct consequence of the increasing popularity of Cloud Computing solutions,
                  data centers are amazingly growing and hence have to urgently face with the energy
                  consumption issue. Available solutions rely on Cloud Computing models and ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 4
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 193

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Leveraging application classes to save power in highly-utilized data centers
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Kostis Kaffes, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Dragos Sbirlea, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Yiyan Lin, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • David Lo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Christos Kozyrakis
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          SoCC '20: Proceedings of the 11th ACM Symposium on Cloud ComputingOctober 2020, pp 134–149https://doi.org/10.1145/3419111.3421274
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Data center energy consumption has become an increasingly significant contributor
                  both to greenhouse emissions and costs. To increase utilization of individual hosts
                  and improve efficiency, most modern data centers co-locate workloads belonging to
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                            research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            July 2019
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Summary of Energy Collection Application in Vehicle Tire Pressure Monitoring System
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Beiyuan Wu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Yuming Fang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Licheng Deng
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            CACRE2019: Proceedings of the 2019 4th International Conference on Automation, Control and Robotics
                     EngineeringJuly 2019, Article No.: 19, pp 1–6https://doi.org/10.1145/3351917.3351918
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Tire pressure monitoring system (TPMS) is used to detect the tire pressure, temperature
                  and many other parameters in real time. At present, most of these systems are powered
                  by button batteries, which cannot last the entire lifetime of the device and ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 71
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Citations1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Downloads71
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 12 Months22
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 6 weeks0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •
