                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Get Access
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        March 2020
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Distributed Power Dispatching Solution for A Future Economic and Environment-friendly
                     Energy Internet
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Yang Li, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Zhaoming Qin, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Fan Zhang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Yuchao Qin, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Haochen Hua, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Junwei Cao
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        IEEA 2020: Proceedings of the 2020 The 9th International Conference on Informatics, Environment,
                     Energy and ApplicationsMarch 2020, pp 72–77https://doi.org/10.1145/3386762.3386773
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        In recent years, the research of power dispatch has been popular in the field of energy
                  Internet (EI) system operation and management. In this paper, a distributed algorithm
                  considering multiple objectives is applied to solve power dispatching problem ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 44
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Citations1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Downloads44
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 12 Months21
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 6 weeks2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Facilitating the implementation of adaptive cloud offloading to improve the energy
                     efficiency of mobile applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Young-Woo Kwon, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Eli Tilevich
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          MOBILESoft '15: Proceedings of the Second ACM International Conference on Mobile Software Engineering
                     and SystemsMay 2015, pp 94–104
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Cloud offloading---leveraging remote cloud-based computing resources to execute energy-intensive
                  functionality---has become a common optimization technique for mobile applications.
                  However, implementing cloud offloading techniques remains a delicate and ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 88
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            June 2016
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Exploiting dynamic timing slack for energy efficiency in ultra-low-power embedded
                     systems
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Hari Cherupalli, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Rakesh Kumar, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • John Sartori
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ISCA '16: Proceedings of the 43rd International Symposium on Computer ArchitectureJune 2016, pp 671–681https://doi.org/10.1109/ISCA.2016.64
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Many emerging applications such as the internet of things, wearables, and sensor networks
                  have ultra-low-power requirements. At the same time, cost and programmability considerations
                  dictate that many of these applications will be powered by general ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Also Published in:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ACM SIGARCH Computer Architecture News: Volume 44 Issue 3, June 2016 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 207
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Downloads207
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 12 Months30

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Strategic Application of Software Process Model to Optimize Business Intelligence
                     Results
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Vangipuram Radhakrishna, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Gunupudi Rajesh Kumar, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Shadi Aljawarneh
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ICEMIS '15: Proceedings of the The International Conference on Engineering & MIS 2015September 2015, Article No.: 44, pp 1–6https://doi.org/10.1145/2832987.2833053
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Organizations across various sectors such as banking, automotive, energy and utilities
                  or any other industry are strongly dependent on the analytics platform to arrive on
                  their business decisions. Analytics has evolved as a major area and has been ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 182
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  •

                                                                                                                                                       
                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Get Access

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                January 2011
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Automated empirical tuning of scientific codes for performance and power consumption
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Shah Faizur Rahman, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Jichi Guo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Qing Yi
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                HiPEAC '11: Proceedings of the 6th International Conference on High Performance and Embedded Architectures
                     and CompilersJanuary 2011, pp 107–116https://doi.org/10.1145/1944862.1944880
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Automatic empirical tuning of compiler optimizations has been widely used to achieve
                  portable high performance for scientific applications. However, as power dissipation
                  becomes increasingly important in modern architecture design, few have attempted to
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 30
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 188
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Downloads188
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 12 Months3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  May 2013
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Energy optimization by exploiting execution slacks in streaming applications on multiprocessor
                     systems
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Amit Kumar Singh, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Anup Das, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Akash Kumar
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  DAC '13: Proceedings of the 50th Annual Design Automation ConferenceMay 2013, Article No.: 115, pp 1–7https://doi.org/10.1145/2463209.2488875
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Dynamic voltage and frequency scaling (DVFS) offers great potential for optimizing
                  the energy efficiency of Multiprocessor Systems-on-Chip (MPSoCs). The conventional
                  approaches for processor voltage and frequency adjustment are not suitable for ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 31
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 226
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Downloads226
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 12 Months19
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 6 weeks3
