                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                January 2008
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A new low energy BIST using a statistical code
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Sunghoon Chun, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Taejin Kim, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Sungho Kang
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ASP-DAC '08: Proceedings of the 2008 Asia and South Pacific Design Automation ConferenceJanuary 2008, pp 647–652
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                To tackle with the increased switching activity during the test operation, this paper
                  proposes a new built-in self test (BIST) scheme for low energy testing that uses a
                  statistical code and a new technique to skip unnecessary test sequences. From a ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 105
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Downloads105

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  October 2011
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Application-driven energy-efficient architecture explorations for big data
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Xiaoyan Gu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Rui Hou, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Ke Zhang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Lixin Zhang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Weiping Wang
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ASBD '11: Proceedings of the 1st Workshop on Architectures and Systems for Big DataOctober 2011, pp 34–40https://doi.org/10.1145/2377978.2377984
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Building energy-efficient systems is critical for big data applications. This paper
                  investigates and compares the energy consumption and the execution time of a typical
                  Hadoop-based big data application running on a traditional Xeon-based cluster and
                  an ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 952
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 12 Months8

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    December 2018
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Energy efficient middleware for dynamic data driven application systems
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Aradhya Biswas, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Richard Fujimoto, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Michael Hunter
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    WSC '18: Proceedings of the 2018 Winter Simulation ConferenceDecember 2018, pp 628–639
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Middleware is required to support and interface multi-modal Dynamic Data Driven Application
                  Systems (DDDAS) with back-end and other computing facilities. Middleware is also needed
                  to support distributed simulations and emulations needed in earlier ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      April 2016
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Exploiting variability for energy optimization of parallel programs
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Wim Lavrijsen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Costin Iancu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Wibe de Jong, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Xin Chen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Karsten Schwan
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      EuroSys '16: Proceedings of the Eleventh European Conference on Computer SystemsApril 2016, Article No.: 9, pp 1–16https://doi.org/10.1145/2901318.2901329
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      In this paper we present optimizations that use DVFS mechanisms to reduce the total
                  energy usage in scientific applications. Our main insight is that noise is intrinsic
                  to large scale parallel executions and it appears whenever shared resources are ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 256
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Citations3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Downloads256
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 12 Months12
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 6 weeks0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F2901318.2901329&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        June 2012
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A methodology for energy performance testing of smartphone applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Abdulhakim Abogharaf, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Rajesh Palit, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Kshirasagar Naik, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Ajit Singh
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        AST '12: Proceedings of the 7th International Workshop on Automation of Software TestJune 2012, pp 110–116
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Smartphones are becoming increasingly popular among users. They are equipped with
                  an enormous number of applications, and these applications drain the smartphones'
                  batteries. Moreover, battery capacity is significantly restricted due to constraints
                  on ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 83
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Citations2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Downloads83
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 12 Months0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Traffic-aware power optimization for network applications on multicore servers
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Jilong Kuang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Laxmi Bhuyan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Raymond Klefstad
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          DAC '12: Proceedings of the 49th Annual Design Automation ConferenceJune 2012, pp 1006–1011https://doi.org/10.1145/2228360.2228541
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          In this paper, we design, implement, and evaluate a traffic-aware and power-efficient
                  multicore server system by translating incoming traffic rate to appropriate system
                  operating level, which is then translated to optimal per-core frequency ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 171
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              •
