                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Downloads171
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 12 Months0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            October 2011
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The interplay of software bloat, hardware energy proportionality and system bottlenecks
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Suparna Bhattacharya, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Karthick Rajamani, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • K. Gopinath, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Manish Gupta
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            HotPower '11: Proceedings of the 4th Workshop on Power-Aware Computing and SystemsOctober 2011, Article No.: 1, pp 1–5https://doi.org/10.1145/2039252.2039253
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            In large flexible software systems, bloat occurs in many forms, causing excess resource
                  utilization and resource bottlenecks. This results in lost throughput and wasted joules.
                  However, mitigating bloat is not easy; efforts are best applied where ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 142
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Citations7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Downloads142
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 12 Months15
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 6 weeks5

                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              December 2019
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Application of the non-linear optimization algorithm differential evolution for optimization
                     of manufacturing systems regarding their energy efficiency
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Matthias Meißner, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Christian Rehtanz, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Johanna Myrzik
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              WSC '19: Proceedings of the Winter Simulation ConferenceDecember 2019, pp 2154–2165
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Due to the increasing importance of energy efficiency in manufacturing systems, this
                  work analyzes the use of two optimization algorithms, which allow an optimization
                  of production systems. These two algorithms are the brute force method and the ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 10
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads10
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months8
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                /action/highlight?doi=10.5555%2F3400397.3400571&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                November 2013
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Initial investigation of a scheme to use instantaneous CPU power consumption for energy
                     savings format
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Vaibhav Sundriyal, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Masha Sosonkina
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                E2SC '13: Proceedings of the 1st International Workshop on Energy Efficient SupercomputingNovember 2013, Article No.: 1, pp 1–6https://doi.org/10.1145/2536430.2536433
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The drive to extract peak performance from the modern computing platforms has lead
                  to drastic increase in their energy and power consumption and thereby affecting the
                  operating costs and failure rates. Modern processors provide techniques, such as ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 119
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Citations6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Downloads119
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 12 Months9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  March 2013
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  DoE-based performance optimization of energy management in sensor nodes powered by
                     tunable energy-harvesters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Tom J. Kazmierski, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Leran Wang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Bashir Al-Hashimi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Geoff Merrett
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  DATE '13: Proceedings of the Conference on Design, Automation and Test in EuropeMarch 2013, pp 484
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  An energy-harvester-powered wireless sensor node is a complicated system with many
                  design parameters. To investigate the various trade-offs among these parameters, it
                  is desirable to explore the multi-dimensional design space quickly. However, due to
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 63
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Downloads63
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 12 Months0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 6 weeks0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Get Access
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    •
