                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    May 2014
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Making web applications more energy efficient for OLED smartphones
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Ding Li, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Angelica Huyen Tran, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • William G. J. Halfond
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ICSE 2014: Proceedings of the 36th International Conference on Software EngineeringMay 2014, pp 527–538https://doi.org/10.1145/2568225.2568321
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     A smartphone’s display is one of its most energy consuming components. Modern smartphones
                  use OLED displays that consume more energy when displaying light colors as op- posed
                  to dark colors. This is problematic as many popular mobile web applications ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 68
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 695
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Citations68
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Downloads695
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 12 Months43
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 6 weeks2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F2568225.2568321&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Export Citations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Save to Binder

                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Energy minimum operation in a reconfigurable gate-level pipelined and power-gated
                     self synchronous FPGA
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Benjamin Devlin, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Makoto Ikeda, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Kunihiro Asada
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ISLPED '11: Proceedings of the 17th IEEE/ACM international symposium on Low-power electronics
                     and designAugust 2011, pp 3–8
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A 65nm self synchronous field programmable gate array (SSFPGA) which uses autonomous
                  gate-level power gating with minimal control circuitry overhead for energy minimum
                  operation is presented. The use of self synchronous signalling allows the FPGA to
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 135
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Citations1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Downloads135
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 12 Months0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        /action/highlight?doi=10.5555%2F2016802.2016806&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        November 2017
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Estimating energy impact of software releases and deployment strategies: the KPMG case study
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Roberto Verdecchia, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Giuseppe Procaccianti, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Ivano Malavolta, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Patricia Lago, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Joost Koedijk
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ESEM '17: Proceedings of the 11th ACM/IEEE International Symposium on Empirical Software Engineering
                     and MeasurementNovember 2017, pp 257–266https://doi.org/10.1109/ESEM.2017.39
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Background. Often motivated by optimization objectives, software products are characterized
                  by different subsequent releases and deployed through different strategies. The impact
                  of these two aspects of software on energy consumption has still to be ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 47
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A power manager with balanced quality of service for energy-harvesting wireless sensor
                     nodes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Trong Nhan Le, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Alain Pegatoquet, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Olivier Berder, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Olivier Sentieys
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ENSsys '14: Proceedings of the 2nd International Workshop on Energy Neutral Sensing SystemsNovember 2014, pp 19–24https://doi.org/10.1145/2675683.2675687
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Future Internet of Things is paving the way for the proliferation of Wireless Sensor
                  Networks (WSNs). To overcome the limited energy in batteries, WSN nodes are relying
                  on everlasting environmental energy. Moreover, a Power Manager (PM) is also embedded
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 4
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 140
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Citations4
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Downloads140
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 12 Months5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 6 weeks2
