                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Performance Analysis of Bicycle-to-Pedestrian Safety Application using Bluetooth Low
                     Energy
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Hyeongcheol Park, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Sungwon Lee, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Eunbae Moon, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Syed Hassan Ahmed, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Dongkyun Kim
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            RACS '17: Proceedings of the International Conference on Research in Adaptive and Convergent
                     SystemsSeptember 2017, pp 160–165https://doi.org/10.1145/3129676.3129727
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The use of bicycles, Segway, Ninebot, and etc. has been rapidly increasing due to
                  the development of personal mobility and technological shift. On the other hand, due
                  to the extensive use of headphones, and smart phones while walking on the road and
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 124
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Downloads124
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 12 Months34
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 6 weeks1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Export Citations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Save to Binder

                                                                                                                     
                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              February 2015
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Optimizing the flash-RAM energy trade-off in deeply embedded systems
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • James Pallister, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Kerstin Eder, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Simon J. Hollis
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              CGO '15: Proceedings of the 13th Annual IEEE/ACM International Symposium on Code Generation
                     and OptimizationFebruary 2015, pp 115–124
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Deeply embedded systems often have the tightest constraints on energy consumption,
                  requiring that they consume tiny amounts of current and run on batteries for years.
                  However, they typically execute code directly from flash, instead of the more energy
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 108
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Citations1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads108
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months8
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                /action/highlight?doi=10.5555%2F2738600.2738615&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                March 2020
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Application-aware scheduling of networked applications over the low-power wireless
                     bus
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Kacper Wardega, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Wenchao Li
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                DATE '20: Proceedings of the 23rd Conference on Design, Automation and Test in EuropeMarch 2020, pp 222–227
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Recent successes of wireless networked systems in advancing industrial automation
                  and in spawning the Internet of Things paradigm motivate the adoption of wireless
                  networked systems in current and future safety-critical applications. As reliability
                  is ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Circuit parameter optimization of class E power amplifier for wireless power transmission
                     applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Kun Li, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Junyou Liu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Shijie Zhang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Yang Liu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Peng Wang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Hongyang Gao
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  EITCE 2020: Proceedings of the 2020 4th International Conference on Electronic Information Technology
                     and Computer EngineeringNovember 2020, pp 1162–1166https://doi.org/10.1145/3443467.3444714
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The parameters of class E power amplifier are optimized for achieving zero voltage
                  switching (ZVS) condition in the magnetically coupled resonance wireless power transmission
                  (MCR-WPT) system. Considering that the working frequency of MCR-WPT is very ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Downloads9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 12 Months9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 6 weeks1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F3443467.3444714&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Save to Binder

                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Get Access
