                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    March 2014
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Automated analysis of performance and energy consumption for cloud applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Feifei Chen, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • John Grundy, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Jean-Guy Schneider, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Yun Yang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Qiang He
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ICPE '14: Proceedings of the 5th ACM/SPEC international conference on Performance engineeringMarch 2014, pp 39–50https://doi.org/10.1145/2568088.2568093
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    In cloud environments, IT solutions are delivered to users via shared infrastructure.
                  One consequence of this model is that large cloud data centres consume large amounts
                  of energy and produce significant carbon footprints. A key objective of cloud ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 19
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 437
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Metrics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Downloads437

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F2568088.2568093&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      November 2014
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Application centric energy-efficiency study of distributed multi-core and hybrid CPU-GPU
                     systems
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ben Cumming, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Gilles Fourestey, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Oliver Fuhrer, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Tobias Gysi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Massimiliano Fatica, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Thomas C. Schulthess
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      SC '14: Proceedings of the International Conference for High Performance Computing, Networking,
                     Storage and AnalysisNovember 2014, pp 819–829https://doi.org/10.1109/SC.2014.72
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      We study the energy used by a production-level regional climate and weather simulation
                  code on a distributed memory system with hybrid CPU-GPU nodes. The code is optimised
                  for both processor architectures, for which we investigate both time and energy ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 269
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Downloads269
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 12 Months4
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        May 2015
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Workshop on applications of human error research to improve software engineering (WAHESE
                     2015)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Gursimran S. Walia, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Jeffrey C. Carver, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Gary Bradshaw
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ICSE '15: Proceedings of the 37th International Conference on Software Engineering - Volume
                     2May 2015, pp 1019–1020
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Advances in the psychological understanding of the origins and manifestations of human
                  error have led to tremendous reductions in errors in fields such as medicine, aviation,
                  and nuclear power plants. This workshop is intended to foster a better ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 50
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Downloads50
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 12 Months2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 6 weeks0

                                       Create a New Binder


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          •
