                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          May 2018
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A Framework Exploiting Process Variability to Improve Energy Efficiency in FPGA Applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Konstantinos Maragos, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • George Lentaris, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Ioannis Stratakos, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Dimitrios Soudris
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          GLSVLSI '18: Proceedings of the 2018 on Great Lakes Symposium on VLSIMay 2018, pp 87–92https://doi.org/10.1145/3194554.3194569
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          As technology node scales-down and process variability increases, the vendors impose
                  even more conservative guard-bands to prevent potential malfunction of their microchips.
                  However, this approach introduces considerable amounts of unexploited ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 68
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Citations3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Downloads68
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 12 Months6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 6 weeks0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F3194554.3194569&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Export Citations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Save to Binder

                                       Create a New Binder

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            March 2018
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Adaptive Performance Optimization under Power Constraint in Multi-thread Applications
                     with Diverse Scalability
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Stefano Conoci, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Pierangelo Di Sanzo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Bruno Ciciani, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Francesco Quaglia
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ICPE '18: Proceedings of the 2018 ACM/SPEC International Conference on Performance EngineeringMarch 2018, pp 16–27https://doi.org/10.1145/3184407.3184419
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Energy consumption has become a core concern in computing systems. In this context,
                  power capping is an approach that aims at ensuring that the power consumption of a
                  system does not overcome a predefined threshold. Although various power capping ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 150
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Citations3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Downloads150
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 12 Months13
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Last 6 weeks2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Modeling performance and energy for applications offloaded to Intel Xeon Phi
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Gary Lawson, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Vaibhav Sundriyal, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Masha Sosonkina, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Yuzhong Shen
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Co-HPC '15: Proceedings of the 2nd International Workshop on Hardware-Software Co-Design for High
                     Performance ComputingNovember 2015, Article No.: 7, pp 1–8https://doi.org/10.1145/2834899.2834903
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Accelerators are adopted to increase performance, reduce time-to-solution, and minimize
                  energy-to-solution. However, employing them efficiently, given system and application
                  characteristics, is often a daunting task. A goal of this work is to propose a ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 8
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 249
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Citations8
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads249
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months31
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks12
