                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                March 2017
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Energy efficient approach for application execution in mobile cloud IoT environment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Raj Kumari, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Sakshi Kaushal
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ICC '17: Proceedings of the Second International Conference on Internet of things, Data and
                     Cloud ComputingMarch 2017, Article No.: 61, pp 1–8https://doi.org/10.1145/3018896.3018957
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Smart mobile devices (SMD) are able to provide different services to the users with
                  minimum delay. Generally, the users are not aware of the complexity of the applications
                  over which they are expecting fast response. SMD are constrained by their ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 96
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Downloads96
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 12 Months14
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 6 weeks1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F3018896.3018957&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Temperature aware microprocessor floorplanning considering application dependent power
                     load
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Chun-Ta Chu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Xinyi Zhang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Lei He, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Tom Tong Jing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ICCAD '07: Proceedings of the 2007 IEEE/ACM international conference on Computer-aided designNovember 2007, pp 586–589
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  This paper studies microprocessor floorplanning considering thermal and throughput
                  optimization. We first develop a stochastic heat diffusion model taking into account
                  the application dependent power load for thermal analysis. Then, we design the ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 177
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 12 Months0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Behavior-level observability don't-cares and application to low-power behavioral synthesis
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Jason Cong, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Bin Liu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Zhiru Zhang
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ISLPED '09: Proceedings of the 2009 ACM/IEEE international symposium on Low power electronics
                     and designAugust 2009, pp 139–144https://doi.org/10.1145/1594233.1594266
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Many techniques for power management employed in advanced RTL synthesis tools rely
                  explicitly or implicitly on observability don't-care (ODC) conditions. In this paper
                  we present a systematic approach to maximizing the effectiveness of these techniques
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 229
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      June 2017
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Power-aware Performance Tuning of GPU Applications Through Microbenchmarking
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Nicola Bombieri, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Federico Busato, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Franco Fummi
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      DAC '17: Proceedings of the 54th Annual Design Automation Conference 2017June 2017, Article No.: 66, pp 1–6https://doi.org/10.1145/3061639.3062304
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Tuning GPU applications is a very challenging task as any source-code optimization
                  can sensibly impact performance, power, and energy consumption of the GPU device.
                  Such an impact also depends on the GPU on which the application is run. This paper
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 164
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Citations1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Downloads164
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 12 Months13
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 6 weeks1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        November 2012
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Reconfiguring the software radio to improve power, price, and portability
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Ye-Sheng Kuo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Pat Pannuto, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Thomas Schmid, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Prabal Dutta
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        SenSys '12: Proceedings of the 10th ACM Conference on Embedded Network Sensor SystemsNovember 2012, pp 267–280https://doi.org/10.1145/2426656.2426683
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Most modern software-defined radios are large, expensive, and power-hungry, and this
                  diminishes their utility in low-power, size-constrained settings like sensor networks
                  and mobile computing. We explore the viability of scaling down the software radio
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 13
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 320
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Citations13
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Downloads320
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 12 Months6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 6 weeks2
