                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    April 2010
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Towards program optimization through automated analysis of numerical precision
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Michael D. Linderman, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Matthew Ho, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • David L. Dill, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Teresa H. Meng, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Garry P. Nolan
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    CGO '10: Proceedings of the 8th annual IEEE/ACM international symposium on Code generation
                     and optimizationApril 2010, pp 230–237https://doi.org/10.1145/1772954.1772987
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Reducing the arithmetic precision of a computation has real performance implications,
                  including increased speed, decreased power consumption, and a smaller memory footprint.
                  For some architectures, e.g., GPUs, there can be such a large performance ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 33
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 542
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Citations33
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Downloads542
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 12 Months22
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 6 weeks5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F1772954.1772987&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Save to Binder

                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Power--Aware Performance Adaptation of Concurrent Applications in Heterogeneous Many-Core
                     Systems
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ali Aalsaud, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Rishad Shafik, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ashur Rafiev, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Fie Xia, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Sheng Yang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Alex Yakovlev
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ISLPED '16: Proceedings of the 2016 International Symposium on Low Power Electronics and DesignAugust 2016, pp 368–373https://doi.org/10.1145/2934583.2934612
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Modern embedded systems execute multiple applications, both sequentially and concurrently.
                  These applications are exercised on heterogeneous platforms generating varying power
                  consumption and system workloads (CPU or memory intensive or both). As a ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 351
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Metrics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Downloads351
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 12 Months36
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 6 weeks3

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Balancing resiliency and energy efficiency of functional units in ultra-low power
                     systems
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Mohammad Saber Golanbari, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Anteneh Gebregiorgis, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Elyas Moradi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Saman Kiamehr, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Mehdi B. Tahoori
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ASPDAC '18: Proceedings of the 23rd Asia and South Pacific Design Automation ConferenceJanuary 2018, pp 637–644
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        For applications with stringent power budget, such as ultra low power systems and
                  Internet of the things (IoT), power and energy are the most important constraints.
                  It is shown that when the supply voltage is close to the threshold voltage of transistor,...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 57
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Downloads57
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 12 Months17
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          An evolutionary approach for video application energy consumption estimation in mobile
                     devices
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Irandir O. de Amorim, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Jose F. V. de Melo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Andson M. Balieiro, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Bruno B. dos Santos
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          WebMedia '19: Proceedings of the 25th Brazillian Symposium on Multimedia and the WebOctober 2019, pp 169–175https://doi.org/10.1145/3323503.3349545
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          In the last years, the multimedia traffic has increased significantly and the mobile
                  devices (e.g. smart phones and tablets) have been widely used to consume this content
                  type. Video applications demand high energy consumption of the device because they
                  ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Total Downloads48
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Last 12 Months14

                                                                                                                                   Published By ACM

                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Application-level voltage and frequency tuning of multi-phase program on the SCC
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Kenneth Berry, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Felipe Navarro, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Chen Liu
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ADAPT '13: Proceedings of the 3rd International Workshop on Adaptive Self-Tuning Computing SystemsJanuary 2013, Article No.: 1, pp 1–7https://doi.org/10.1145/2484904.2484905
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            With the technology advancement, we are quickly progressing towards the many-core
                  era. Corresponding to this shift, techniques on how we program such chip are beginning
                  to change. The Single-Chip Cloud Computer (SCC) is an experimental processor created
                  ...
