                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Development of low power and high performance application processor (T6G) for multimedia
                     mobile applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Yoshiyuki Kitasho, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Yu Kikuchi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Takayoshi Shimazawa, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Yasuo Ohara, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Masafumi Takahashi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Yoshio Masubuchi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Yukihito Oowaki
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ASPDAC '11: Proceedings of the 16th Asia and South Pacific Design Automation ConferenceJanuary 2011, pp 755–759
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              TOSHIBA has developed a mobile application processor for multimedia mobile applications
                  in 40 nm with a H.264 full high-definition (full-HD) video engine and a video/audio
                  multiprocessor for various CODECs and image processing. The application processor
                  ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 126
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Citations1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads126
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A tool-supported approach for modular design of energy-aware software
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Steven te Brinke, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Somayeh Malakuti, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Christoph Bockisch, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Lodewijk Bergmans, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mehmet Akşit, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Shmuel Katz
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                SAC '14: Proceedings of the 29th Annual ACM Symposium on Applied ComputingMarch 2014, pp 1206–1212https://doi.org/10.1145/2554850.2554964
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The reduction of energy usage by software-controlled systems has many advantages,
                  including prolonged battery life and reduction of greenhouse gas emissions. Thus,
                  being able to implement energy optimization in software is essential. This requires
                  a ...

                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 88
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Citations3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Downloads88
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 12 Months12
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  May 2017

                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Performance-based guidelines for energy efficient mobile applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Luis Cruz, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Rui Abreu
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  MOBILESoft '17: Proceedings of the 4th International Conference on Mobile Software Engineering and
                     SystemsMay 2017, pp 46–57https://doi.org/10.1109/MOBILESoft.2017.19
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Mobile and wearable devices are nowadays the de facto personal computers, while desktop computers are becoming less popular. Therefore,
                  it is important for companies to deliver efficient mobile applications. As an example,
                  Google has published a set of ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 18
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 163
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Citations18
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Downloads163
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 12 Months23
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 6 weeks1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    /action/highlight?doi=10.1109%2FMOBILESoft.2017.19&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights

                                                                                                                                           May 2017

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Awakening awareness on energy consumption in software engineering
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Erik Jagroep, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Jordy Broekman, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Jan Martijn E. M. van der Werf, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Sjaak Brinkkemper, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Patricia Lago, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Leen Blom, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Rob van Vliet
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ICSE-SEIS '17: Proceedings of the 39th International Conference on Software Engineering: Software
                     Engineering in Society TrackMay 2017, pp 76–85https://doi.org/10.1109/ICSE-SEIS.2017.10
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Software producing organizations have the ability to address the energy impact of
                  their ICT solutions during the development process. However, while industry is convinced
                  of the energy impact of hardware, the role of software has mostly been ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 93
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Citations3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Downloads93
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 12 Months24
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 6 weeks3

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      /action/highlight?doi=10.1109%2FICSE-SEIS.2017.10&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights
