    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Energy and Performance Prediction of CUDA Applications using Dynamic Regression Models
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Shajulin Benedict, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • R. S. Rejitha, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Suja A. Alex
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ISEC '16: Proceedings of the 9th India Software Engineering ConferenceFebruary 2016, pp 37–47https://doi.org/10.1145/2856636.2856643
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Many emerging supercomputers and future exa-scale computing machines require accelerator-based
                  GPU computing architectures for boosting their computing performances. CUDA is one
                  of the widely applied GPGPU parallel computing platform for those ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 123
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Citations1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Downloads123
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 12 Months5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 6 weeks1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F2856636.2856643&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
        



        
        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        

        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        July 2015
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Modeling Impact of Power- and Thermal-Aware Fans Management on Data Center Energy
                     Consumption
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Wojciech Piatek, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Ariel Oleksiak, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Micha vor dem Berge
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        e-Energy '15: Proceedings of the 2015 ACM Sixth International Conference on Future Energy SystemsJuly 2015, pp 253–258https://doi.org/10.1145/2768510.2768525
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        In this paper we study the power usage and thermal management of micro servers to
                  analyze their impact on the overall data center energy consumption. We propose thermal
                  models of micro servers based on analytical approach tuned with parameters derived
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 118
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Citations3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Downloads118
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 12 Months12
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A closed loop transmitting power self-calibration scheme for energy efficient WiNoC
                     architectures
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Andrea Mineo, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Mohd Shahrizal Rusli, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Maurizio Palesi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Giuseppe Ascia, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Vincenzo Catania, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • M. N. Marsono
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          DATE '15: Proceedings of the 2015 Design, Automation & Test in Europe Conference & ExhibitionMarch 2015, pp 513–518
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          In a wireless Network-on-Chip (WiNoC) the radio transceiver accounts for a significant
                  fraction of the total communication energy. Recently, a configurable transceiver architecture
                  able to regulate its transmitting power based on the location of the ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 60
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              •

                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Energy efficient implementation of G.729 for wireless VoIP application
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Aihong Yao, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Junjun Gu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Gang Qu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Shuvra Bhattacharyya
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ICAIT '08: Proceedings of the 2008 International Conference on Advanced Infocomm TechnologyJuly 2008, Article No.: 133, pp 1–7https://doi.org/10.1145/1509315.1509448
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            In this paper, we describe the formatting guidelines for ACM SIG Proceedings. Traditionally
                  silence in VoIP applications is detected by a VAD algorithm after G.729 compression,
                  both have high computational and energy cost. However, such cost on silence ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 74
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •
