                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Managing the Energy-Delay Tradeoff in Mobile Applications with Tempus
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Nima Nikzad, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Marjan Radi, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Octav Chipara, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • William G. Griswold
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Middleware '15: Proceedings of the 16th Annual Middleware ConferenceNovember 2015, pp 259–270https://doi.org/10.1145/2814576.2814803
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Energy-efficiency is a critical concern in continuously-running mobile applications,
                  such as those for health and context monitoring. An attractive approach to saving
                  energy in such applications is to defer the execution of delay-tolerant operations
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 214
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Citations7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads214
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months33
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks5

                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                On the role of system software in energy management of neuromorphic computing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Twisha Titirsha, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Shihao Song, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Adarsha Balaji, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Anup Das
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                CF '21: Proceedings of the 18th ACM International Conference on Computing FrontiersMay 2021, pp 124–132https://doi.org/10.1145/3457388.3458664
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Neuromorphic computing systems such as DYNAPs and Loihi have recently been introduced
                  to the computing community to improve performance and energy efficiency of machine
                  learning programs, especially those that are implemented using Spiking Neural ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 49
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  May 2017
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Assisting non-specialist developers to build energy-efficient software
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Benito Fernandes, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Gustavo Pinto, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Fernando Castor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ICSE-C '17: Proceedings of the 39th International Conference on Software Engineering CompanionMay 2017, pp 158–160https://doi.org/10.1109/ICSE-C.2017.133
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  In this paper we introduce CECOtool, a tool that analyzes the energy behavior of alternative
                  collection implementations and provides potentially useful recommendations about good
                  implementation options. We applied it to two real-world software systems ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 73
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Downloads73

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    March 2013
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Published By ACM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    A design method for modular energy-aware software
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Steven te Brinke, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Somayeh Malakuti, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Christoph Bockisch, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Lodewijk Bergmans, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Mehmet Akşit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    SAC '13: Proceedings of the 28th Annual ACM Symposium on Applied ComputingMarch 2013, pp 1180–1182https://doi.org/10.1145/2480362.2480584
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Nowadays reducing the overall energy consumption of software is important. A well-known
                  solution is extending the functionality of software with energy optimizers, which
                  monitor the energy consumption of software and adapt it accordingly. To make such
                  ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 12
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 146
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Citations12
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total Downloads146
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 12 Months14
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Last 6 weeks0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Development and Application of State-Sensing Technology for Power Equipment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Wenjun Liu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Yuanfu Xu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Qiang Han, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Yao Wang, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Lei Xu
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ICITEE2020: Proceedings of the 3rd International Conference on Information Technologies and Electrical
                     EngineeringDecember 2020, pp 361–369https://doi.org/10.1145/3452940.3453497
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      With the increasing expansion of power grid scale, the research and application of
                  artificial intelligence technology in the electrical field will further promote the
                  profound transformation of power grid structure. Power equipment, as core elements
                  of ...
