                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 49
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Citations0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total Downloads49
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 12 Months24
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Last 6 weeks1

                                                                                                                                                                                
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Energy-delay tradeoffs in smartphone applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Moo-Ryong Ra, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Jeongyeup Paek, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Abhishek B. Sharma, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Ramesh Govindan, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Martin H. Krieger, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Michael J. Neely
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    MobiSys '10: Proceedings of the 8th international conference on Mobile systems, applications, and
                     servicesJune 2010, pp 255–270https://doi.org/10.1145/1814433.1814459
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Many applications are enabled by the ability to capture videos on a smartphone and
                  to have these videos uploaded to an Internet-connected server. This capability requires
                  the transfer of large volumes of data from the phone to the infrastructure. ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 166
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 2,138
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                             Published By ACM

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A component infrastructure for performance and power modeling of parallel scientific
                     applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Van Bui, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Boyana Norris, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Kevin Huck, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Lois Curfman McInnes, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Li Li, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Oscar Hernandez, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Barbara Chapman
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      CBHPC '08: Proceedings of the 2008 compFrame/HPC-GECO workshop on Component based high performanceOctober 2008, Article No.: 6, pp 1–11https://doi.org/10.1145/1456190.1456199
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Characterizing the performance of scientific applications is essential for effective
                  code optimization, both by compilers and by high-level adaptive numerical algorithms.
                  While maximizing power efficiency is becoming increasingly important in current ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 12
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 310
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Citations12
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Downloads310
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 12 Months9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Last 6 weeks2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        /action/highlight?doi=10.1145%2F1456190.1456199&query=%28Title%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28code+OR+program+OR+software+OR+application%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28optim*+OR+improv*+OR+automat*+OR+reduc*%29%29+AND+%28Title%3A%28energy+OR+power%29+OR+Abstract%3A%28energy+OR+power%29%29Highlights
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

Binder

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        November 2018

                                                                                                                                                                                                           
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Energy efficiency modeling of parallel applications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Mark Endrei, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Chao Jin, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Minh Ngoc Dinh, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • David Abramson, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Heidi Poxon, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Luiz DeRose, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Bronis R. de Supinski
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        SC '18: Proceedings of the International Conference for High Performance Computing, Networking,
                     Storage, and AnalysisNovember 2018, Article No.: 17, pp 1–13
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Energy efficiency has become increasingly important in high performance computing
                  (HPC), as power constraints and costs escalate. Workload and system characteristics
                  form a complex optimization search space in which optimal settings for energy ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 207
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Total Downloads207

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Alternative power supply concepts for self-sufficient wireless sensor nodes by energy
                     harvesting
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Robert Kappel, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Günter Hofer, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Gerald Holweg, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Thomas Herndl, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Günter Hofer, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Gerald Holweg
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          DATE '13: Proceedings of the Conference on Design, Automation and Test in EuropeMarch 2013, pp 481
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Replacing batteries in wireless sensor nodes by energy harvesting enables a maintenance-free
                  operation and an increasing degree of miniaturization at the cost of higher power
                  management efforts. The limited power capability of environmental sources ...
