                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 60
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              •

to Binder

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            research-article

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Improving energy efficiency of personal sensing applications with heterogeneous multi-processors
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Moo-Ryong Ra, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Bodhi Priyantha, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Aman Kansal, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Jie Liu
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            UbiComp '12: Proceedings of the 2012 ACM Conference on Ubiquitous ComputingSeptember 2012, pp 1–10https://doi.org/10.1145/2370216.2370218
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The availability of multiple sensors on mobile devices offers a significant new capability
                  to enable rich user and context aware applications. Many of these applications run
                  in the background to continuously sense user context. However, running these ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 29
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 728
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Citations29

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              research-article
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              November 2011
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Published By ACM

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Hardware/software co-design for energy-efficient seismic modeling
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Jens Krueger, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • David Donofrio, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • John Shalf, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Marghoob Mohiyuddin, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Samuel Williams, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Leonid Oliker, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Franz-Josef Pfreund
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              SC '11: Proceedings of 2011 International Conference for High Performance Computing, Networking,
                     Storage and AnalysisNovember 2011, Article No.: 73, pp 1–12https://doi.org/10.1145/2063384.2063482
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Reverse Time Migration (RTM) has become the standard for high-quality imaging in the
                  seismic industry. RTM relies on PDE solutions using stencils that are 8th order or larger, which require large-scale HPC clusters to meet the computational
                  demands. ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 23
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 377
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Citations23
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Total Downloads377
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 12 Months17
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last 6 weeks0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                       Save to Binder

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                research-article

Published By ACM

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Speeding-up data-driven applications with program summaries
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Sonia Guéhis, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Virginie Goasdoué-Thion, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Philippe Rigaux
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IDEAS '09: Proceedings of the 2009 International Database Engineering & Applications SymposiumSeptember 2009, pp 66–76https://doi.org/10.1145/1620432.1620440
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                We consider the class of database programs and address the problem of minimizing the cost of their exchanges with the database
                  server. This cost partly consists of query execution at the server side, and partly
                  of query submission and network exchanges ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 105
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Metrics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total Downloads105

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Last 6 weeks0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  •

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Save to Binder

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Towards native code offloading platforms for image processing in mobile applications: a case study
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Guillermo Valenzuela, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Andres Neyem, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Jose I. Benedetto, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Jaime Navon, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Pablo Sanabria, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Juan A. Karmy, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Felipe Balbontin
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  MOBILESoft '17: Proceedings of the 4th International Conference on Mobile Software Engineering and
                     SystemsMay 2017, pp 221–222https://doi.org/10.1109/MOBILESoft.2017.27
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  In this paper, we present a real-life case study to show the advantages of a new code
                  offloading solution focused on improving both performance and energy consumption for
                  image processing mobile applications. From our experiments, we found that ...
