                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Energy efficient streaming applications with guaranteed throughput on MPSoCs
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Jun Zhu, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Ingo Sander, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Axel Jantsch
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    EMSOFT '08: Proceedings of the 8th ACM international conference on Embedded softwareOctober 2008, pp 119–128https://doi.org/10.1145/1450058.1450075
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    In this paper we present a design space exploration flow to achieve energy efficiency
                  for streaming applications on MPSoCs while meeting the specified throughput constraints.
                  The public domain simulators Sim-Panalyzer and Cacti are used to estimate the ...

    Published By ACM

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Enhancing energy efficiency of database applications using SSDs
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Daniel Schall, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Volker Hudlet, 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Theo Härder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      C3S2E '10: Proceedings of the Third C* Conference on Computer Science and Software EngineeringMay 2010, pp 1–9https://doi.org/10.1145/1822327.1822328
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               		
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Presently, solid state disks (SSDs) are emerging as a disruptive storage technology
                  and promise breakthroughs for important application properties. They quickly enter
                  the enterprise domain and (partially) replace magnetic disks (HDDs) for database ...
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 
                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 17
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 277
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Citations17
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total Downloads277

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Export Citations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 
                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Save to Binder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                       Create a New Binder
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 
                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          •
